name: AR Spaceship
description:
IMPORTANT: You need to print the AR Card to play:
http://vz777.com/ar/

AR Spaceship is an Augmented Reality Game using your camera and an AR Card that you can print at home. Simply by moving from left to right or by tilting the device you control the spaceship. Fly through as many gates as possible by shooting lasers and avoiding red mines. What's gonna be your high-score!?
